question: Who had three daughters?
answer1: a king

question: Who did the youngest princess want to marry?
answer1: the Brown Bear of Norway

question: Why did the youngest princess want to marry the Brown Bear of Norway?
answer1: A nurse of hers used to be telling her of an enchanted prince that she called by that name, and she fell in love with him, and his name was the first name on her tongue.

question: What did the princesses do after the youngest princess told them who she wanted to marry?
answer1: laughed, and they joked with the princess all the rest of the evening

question: Where was the youngest princess when she woke up?
answer1: a great hall

question: What did the very beautiful prince do after the youngest princess woke up?
answer1: was on one knee before her, and telling her how much he loved her, and asking her wouldn't she be his queen

question: What happened after the prince proposed to the youngest princess?
answer1: They got married.

question: Who put the prince under an enchantment?
answer1: a sorceress

question: Why did the sorceress put the prince under an enchantment?
answer1: He refused to wed her daughter.

question: What happened after the prince refused to wed the sorceress's daughter?
answer1: She made him take the form of a bear by day.

question: What did the prince need to do to break the enchantment?
answer1: take the form of bear by day, and he was to continue so till a lady would marry him of her own free will, and endure five years of great trials after

question: Why did the youngest princess's husband disappear when she woke up?
answer1: He turned into a bear during the day.

question: How did the youngest princess feel after her husband disappeared in the morning?
answer1: sad

question: What did the prince warn the youngest princess?
answer1: whenever she began to tire of him, or ceased to have faith in him, they would be parted for ever, and he'd be obliged to marry the witch's daughter

question: Why was the youngest princess twice as happy now?
answer1: She had her child to keep her company in the day when she couldn't see her husband.

question: Who took the youngest princess's baby?
answer1: an eagle

question: How did the youngest princess feel after the eagle took her baby?
answer1: sad

question: Why did the youngest princess stop her cries and complaints?
answer1: She bethought of what he said soon after their marriage.

question: What did the prince do after the youngest princess went to get her baby back?
answer1: caught her, and looked at her very seriously

question: What happened after the youngest princess lost her son?
answer1: A beautiful little girl was sent to her.

question: Why didn't the youngest princess allow the window to be more than a few inches open?
answer1: The eagle took her last baby.
answer2: The window was open when she lost her last baby.

question: What will happen after the youngest princess has a little girl sent to her?
answer1: A beautiful greyhound stood before them, took the child out of the father's hand.

question: Why did the youngest princess believe it was her husband's fault?
answer1: There were some of the servants in the next room, and all declared that neither child nor dog passed out.

question: Why did the youngest princess hardly allow a window or a door to be left open?
answer1: She did not want to lose her third child.
answer2: She already lost two of her children.

question: Who took the youngest princess's third baby?
answer1: a lady

question: How did the youngest princess feel when she saw the lady standing by them?
answer1: scared

question: What did the youngest princess want to do after she recovered?
answer1: see her father and mother and sisters

question: What did the youngest princess need to do when she felt inclined to return?
answer1: mention her wish when she laid down at night

question: Where was the youngest princess after she woke up?
answer1: her own old chamber in her father's palace

question: How did the youngest princess's family feel after they saw her again?
answer1: happy

question: Why did the mother and sisters consult a wise woman that used to bring eggs to the castle?
answer1: They had great faith in her wisdom.

question: What did the wise woman tell the family to do?
answer1: secure the bear's skin that the prince was obliged to put on every morning, and get it burned, and then he couldn't help being a man night and day, and the enchantment would be at an end

question: Where was the youngest princess after she made the wish to see her husband?
answer1: her husband's palace

question: Why did the youngest princess return to her husband?
answer1: She felt so great a longing to see her husband again.

question: What did the youngest princess's husband give to her every night?
answer1: a sweet drink out of a gold cup

question: What did the youngest princess do the next night?
answer1: She got a few drops of the sleepy posset that she saved the evening before put into her husband's night drink.

question: Why didn't the youngest princess drink the sweet drink that her husband gave her?
answer1: She wanted to use it on her husband.
answer2: She needed to save some to make her husband fall asleep.

question: What did the youngest princess find in the corner?
answer1: a Beautiful brown bear's hide

question: What did the youngest princess do after she found the a Beautiful brown bear's hide?
answer1: stole back, and went down to the parlour fire, and put the hide into the middle of it till it was all fine ashes

question: How will the husband feel after he finds out that his wife threw away the bear's hide?
answer1: mad

question: What happened after the youngest princess threw away the bear's hide?
answer1: The husband needed to marry the witch's daughter.
answer2: The husband needed to leave his wife.

question: Who was the egg-wife that gave the youngest princess counsel?
answer1: the witch

question: What did the youngest princess do after her husband left for the witch's castle?
answer1: shouted after him, and then seeing there was no use, she dressed herself and pursued him

question: How did the youngest princess feel after she realized she made a mistake?
answer1: guilty

question: Where did the husband go to when the sun was about to set?
answer1: a little house

question: Who was the beautiful little boy in the little house?
answer1: her eldest child

question: How did the youngest princess feel after she was reunited with her eldest child?
answer1: happy

question: What will happen to the husband after the sun rises?
answer1: He will lose all memory of herself and the children.

question: What did the husband give to the youngest princess on the second day?
answer1: scissors

question: What did the husband give to the youngest princess on the third day?
answer1: a comb

question: What did the youngest princess need to do to help her husband remember her again?
answer1: put her half-ring to his

question: What will happen after the husband enters the woods?
answer1: He will forget everything that ever happened between them.

question: Where did the youngest princess walk to?
answer1: a woodman's cottage on the edge of the wood

question: What did the youngest princess offer to the woodman and his wife?
answer1: diamonds, and pearls, and silk stuffs, and gold thread

question: What did the youngest princess ask the head footman to do?
answer1: put his hand out at the window and cut her off a sprig or two of honeysuckle

question: Who began to take notice of the beautiful young woman at the lodge?
answer1: the servants and conceited folk at the big house

question: Where was the youngest princess's husband?
answer1: in the palace of the young mistress

question: What did the youngest princess wish for the head footman?
answer1: a pair of horns spring out of his head, and sing to the lodge

question: How did the head footman feel after the youngest princess tricked him?
answer1: angry

question: Why did the prince stroll down to where the youngest princess lived?
answer1: He heard about what the young princess did.
answer2: He heard the story of the young princess and the head footman.

question: Why did the witch's daughter want the scissors?
answer1: The scissors turned the paper into silk.
answer2: She saw the power of the scissors.

question: Why did the youngest princess want to spend one night outside the prince's chamber?
answer1: She wanted to help her husband.
answer2: She wanted to make her husband remember her.

question: How did the witch's daughter feel after she heard the youngest princess's request?
answer1: angry

question: Why didn't the witch's daughter say something dreadful to the youngest princess?
answer1: The scissors kept on cutting, and the silk growing richer and richer every inch.

question: What happened after the youngest princess came into the palace?
answer1: The prince was in such a dead sleep that all she did couldn't awake him.

question: How did the youngest princess feel after she could not wake up the prince?
answer1: sad

question: What did the youngest princess do while the witch's daughter passed by?
answer1: combed her hair

question: Why did the witch's daughter make another bargain with the youngest princess?
answer1: The witch's daughter wanted the comb.
answer2: The witch's daughter saw that the comb dropped out pearls and diamonds.

question: What happened after the youngest princess came to the prince's chamber on the second night?
answer1: She failed to talk to him.
answer2: She failed to wake him up.

question: Why couldn't the prince wake up at night?
answer1: The witch's daughter gave him sleepy posset.
answer2: The witch's daughter made him a drink that caused him to fall asleep.

question: What did the prince do after he stopped to talk to the youngest princess?
answer1: asked her could he do anything to serve her

question: Why did the witch's daughter give the prince sleepy posset to drink?
answer1: She did not want him to talk to the youngest princess.
answer2: She did not want her husband to wake up.

question: What did the youngest princess tell the prince to do?
answer1: not tasting any drink to-night

question: Why did the witch's daughter make a third bargain with the youngest princess?
answer1: She wanted the hand-reel.
answer2: She saw that the hand-reel wound threads of gold.

question: How did the prince feel after he heard the youngest princess's song?
answer1: confused

question: What happened after the youngest princess and prince connected their rings together?
answer1: His full memory came back on him, and he flung his arms round his wife's neck, and both burst into tears.

question: How did the prince feel after he regained his memory?
answer1: happy

question: Why did the castle walls split and crack?
answer1: The enchantment was broken.
